services.title: Remote Notarization
services.description: Conduct notarization remotely, ensuring convenience from the comfort of home.

services.title: AI-Assisted Notarization
services.description: Leverage an AI chatbot for guided assistance throughout the notarization process.

services.title: Document Management
services.description: View and download past notarized documents anytime for easy access.

services.title: Tamper-Proof Storage
services.description: Ensure tamper-proof storage of notarized documents using blockchain technology.

services.title: Automated Notary Registries
services.description: Automatically generate and manage notary registries for notary officers.

services.title: Appointment Scheduling
services.description: Schedule appointments seamlessly with notary officers at preferred times.

services.title: Real-Time Status Tracking
services.description: Track the status of ongoing notarization requests in real-time.

services.title: Digital Signatures
services.description: Facilitate digital signatures to enhance the notarization workflow.
